_header: O merciful God maker of all mankind
_description: An epitaph — two 6-line stanzas (aabaab) and burden (cc): ‘To dy to dy what haue I / offendit þat deth is so hasty’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
O marcyfull God maker of all mankyndWhat meneth dethe in his
                    mynd…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Wherfor how my yf þou be hyeThynk non oþer but
                    þou shalt dye
